Date: 2025-03-19 15:49
Subject: Business Continuity Plan - External parties survey
--------------------------------------------------
Dear Diana,

Hope you are well.

As part of the Business Continuity Plan, we are required to request a survey from partners that provide essential services that if disrupted would materially impact the group.

If possible, appreciate if you can send the survey (link: Business Continuity Management <https://chalhoub.eu.qualtrics.com/jfe/form/SV_78IeExhP9xQ1z0i> ) to GIG to fill up and submit. If they can provide details at least for UAE and KSA, that should be sufficient.

Appreciate your kind support.

Best Regards,
Hagop

Dear Diana,

As part of the Business Continuity Plan, we are required to request a survey from partners that provide essential services that if disrupted would materially impact the group.

 

If possible, appreciate if you can send the survey (link: Business Continuity Management <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/JL0zC6zPJSyw0j7C5sLU5vItj?domain=chalhoub.eu.qualtrics.com> ) to GIG to fill up and submit. Hagop
